title: Chocolate Chip Cookies
author: Violet Sorrengail
ingredients: 1/2 cup butter - 1/2 cup granulated sugar - 1/4 cup brown sugar (packed) - 2 teaspoons vanilla extract - 1 large egg - 1 3/4 cups all-purpose flour - 1/2 teaspoon baking soda - 1/2 teaspoon kosher salt - 1 cup semisweet chocolate chips
directions: 1- Preheat oven to 350 F 2 - Microwave the butter for about 40 seconds. Butter should be completely melted but shouldn't be hot. 3 - In a large bowl, mix butter with the sugars until well-combined. 4 - Stir in vanilla and egg until incorporated. 5 - Add the flour, baking soda, and salt. Please read the recipe note about properly measuring flour. 6- Mix dough until just combined. Dough should be soft and a little sticky but not overly sticky. 7. Stir in chocolate chips. 8. Scoop out 1.5 tablespoons of dough (medium cookie scoop) and place 2 inches apart on a baking sheet.9. Bake for 7-10 minutes, or until cookies are set. They will be puffy and still look a little underbaked in the middle.
